name: FractionallySizedBox
desc: A widget that sizes its child to a fraction of the total available space. For more details about the layout algorithm, see [RenderFractionallySizedOverflowBox].

fields.name: widthFactor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.basic.fractionallySizedBox.widthFactor} If non-null, the fraction of the incoming width given to the child.

fields.name: heightFactor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.basic.fractionallySizedBox.heightFactor} If non-null, the fraction of the incoming height given to the child.
